original_title: President orders strict laws to prevent child abuse
original_body_lines: President Ranil Wickremesinghe has ordered strict legislation to prevent child abuse, emphasizing the urgency of combating the issue perpetrated by teachers, elders and various segments of society.
The decision has been taken following recent incidents of abuse including the death of a 16-year-old girl and the abuse of 16 children by a tuition teacher, President’s Media Division (PMD) said.
